body.p: All option pricing models take into account, as a minimum, the following factors:

li.p: the exercise price of the option;
the current price of the underlying shares;
the expected volatility of the share price;
the dividends expected on the shares (if appropriate); and
the risk‑free interest rate for the life of the option.
